name: CHARLIE'S BIRTHDAY PARTY!
description:
WARNING: OCCASIONAL SWEARING, BLOOD, EYE CONTACT? AND BRIGHT COLORS CONTROLS: WASD OR THE ARROW KEYS FOR A KEYBOARD AND JUST SLIDE YOUR FINGER IF YOU'RE ON MOBILE TO MOVE!

YOU'VE BEEN INVITED TO suffer CHARLIE'S BIRTHDAY PARTY!!! HAVE FUN ^__^ (you better not do anything stupid). ENJOY!

CREDITS:

sprites, backgrounds, art (on the sidebar), and pretty much everything was done by ME!!!

characters like ace, katie, coco, rubuen, leah and alphalfa DON'T BELONG TO ME, they belong to other people (sparky, neo, and zephyr) BUT CHARLIE BELONGS TO ME...please be nice to him, its his birthday.

i used  the original bitsy lol
